• we've added Valentine's Day themes to the Special Pack

The #1 Calculator on the App Store!
• Converter is now offline available

The Best Calculator on the App Store! With a Standard and a Scientific calculator!
- Stability Improvements

The Best Calculator on the App Store! With a Standard and a Scientific calculator!
- Stability Improvements

The #1 Calculator on the App Store!
• We've listened to your feedback and added the possibility of setting the decimal places in both the general and currency calculator
• Switch between the dot and the comma as the decimal notation
• Become Pre

The #1 Calculator on the App Store
• We've been working on the UI, happy calculating!

-- The #1 Calculator on the App Store --
• NEW FEATURE! It is now possible to edit your equations! Edit both operations and operands of an equation. This is going to save you a lot of time, you don't have to write out the whole equation if you mistype!

-- The #1 Calculator on the App Store --
The Calculator is ready for iOS 11: try the new gesture Drag and Drop to maximize your productivity!
Drag calculation results or entire calculations from The Calculator to another app or vice versa.

-- The #1 Calculator on the App Store --
The Calculator is ready for iOS 11: try the new gesture Drag and Drop to maximize your productivity!
Drag calculation results or entire calculations from The Calculator to another app or vice versa.

We've listened to your feedback an fixed:
• The missing decimal button on the watch app
• The incorrect rounding of decimal values on the watch app

• In portrait mode on the ipad some advanced buttons did not work properly, we've fixed this bug!

As always, we appreciate your feedback. Please keep sharing your experience to feedback@impalastudios.com

Yes, it’s ready; The NEW Calculator with FRACTIONS*!
Calculate with ease, get a brand-new UI which is adjustable to your preferences, multifunctional tools for everyday calculations and unique themes.
Count on The Calculator! *available only via sub

• We've been working on the UI and created a tab bar view for you. Happy Calculating!
• We've added a new functionality to The Calculator: the fractions calculator
• Bug fixes

• We’ve updated the data security connections
• We fixed a bug which for subscribed users caused: ads still showing

• Our prime goal is to improve continuously and make your experience better with every update; This version contains minor bug fixes.

Thank you for your continued support! We highly appreciate your feedback, so don’t hesitate to contact us at feedb

• This update contains our newest feature: ‘Dictate’.
Tap on the mic icon and speak out your equation. Just as simple as that!

Try the Dictate function and share your experience with us at feedback@impalastudios.com.
You can count on The Calc

Bug Fixes:
• We solved a bug in the settings menu which caused problems after rotating your device, and
• A bug where sharing results disabled the settings menu

• Our prime goal is to improve continuously and make your experience better with every update; this version contains minor bug fixes - Thank you for your continued support! - We highly appreciate your feedback, so don’t hesitate to contact us at feedback@

Get iOS-13 Ready! We have optimized the app for a seamless iOS-13 experience.
Go take a look at how we've implemented Dark Mode in The Calculator! Dark Mode will soon be also available for iPad users.

• Thank you for using The Calculator! We’ve made some performance improvements to give you the best possible experience.

• We’ve fixed a bug with the widget lay-out.
• We've fixed a bug where it wasn't possible for some users to use the currency tab.
• We've fixed a bug where it wasn't possible to copy-paste a result or equation.

Thank you for using The Calculator!
• Our job is to provide you an optimised app! Therefore we fixed some bugs and made some improvements.
• We've fixed a crash occurring on IOS 8
• Reduced the showing of notifications in the result view
• Get in style with the new seasonal themes and be ready for Winter!

• We’ve fixed a crash occurring in the app while running on iOS 12
• We've updated marketing texts

• We’ve fixed a crash occurring in the app while running on iOS 12

• In 2019 you can still Count on The Calculator!

• We’ve added new marketing material to the App Store for the new iPad Pro!

• We've optimized the accessibility of The Calculator and now fully support VoiceOver.
VoiceOver improves the usability for people with a vision impairment. We continuously working on improving The Calculator for the best user experience for all!
